line.comment: * chooses the Coordinated Invasion target sector.
*chance based, 3 different types. If there are no valid targets we don't try something else.
* humiliate another faction and take their dejure sector
* collecting own dejure sectors in proximity
* turning own nearby enclaves into clusters
* collecting own dejure sectors in entire galaxy
* turn own enclaves in entire galaxy into clusters

sval.val: chooses the Coordinated Invasion target sector.
chance based, 3 different types. If there are no valid targets we don't try something else.
humiliate another faction and take their dejure sector
collecting own dejure sectors in proximity
turning own nearby enclaves into clusters
collecting own dejure sectors in entire galaxy
turn own enclaves in entire galaxy into clusters
